City Secretary
==============

The Roman Forest City Secretary administers all municipal legislative processes, including agendas, minutes, general accounting, customer service, notarizations, point of email contact, route incoming calls and messages to department heads, scheduling of meetings and revising the city calendar, publications, etc.

The secretary also serves as Records Management Officer and responsible for coordinating all items related to Public Information and Records Management.

As City Secretary, she is responsible for the management and safeguarding, organizing and processing official records and documents of the city as well as prepares all City Council Meeting documents and packets, and is the Chief Election Official, will assist the City Administrator and City Clerk when necessary.

---
